WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_check_hint: Enables sending a message to the chat window upon a 1st level or higher spell being cast.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_whisper_gm_hint: When enabled, all messages are sent as Blind GM messages instead of from the player.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_chat_msg_hint: Enter custom message in chat box.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_auto_d20_name: Auto Roll for a Wild Magic Surge instead of just the prompt
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_auto_d20_hint: Auto roll the dice and show the result.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_auto_d20_msg_name: Text to show in chat with Auto Wild Magic Surge roll
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_auto_d20_msg_hint: On a Wild Magic Surge, show this message.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_auto_d20_msg_no_sur: Text to show in chat with Auto Wild Magic Surge roll and no surge happens
On a failed auto Wild Magic Surge roll, show this message.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_toc_name: Enable Tides of Chaos auto recharge
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_toc_hint: Enables Tides of Chaos auto recharge when a Wild Magic Surge occurs.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_rolltable_enabled_n: Enable Auto Roll on a Wild Magic Surge Table
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_rolltable_enabled_h: Enable Auto Roll on a Wild Magic Surge Table.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_rolltable_name_hint: The Roll Table to use when rolling for the surge effect. Enter the name of the Roll Table.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_custom_roll_dice_fo: Set the dice formula you want to roll. The default is 1d20.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_custom_roll_result_: The target result of the dice roll
What is the dice roll result you want to check against.
Based on the target dice roll, should the result be less/greater than or equal to the result to trigger the Wild Magic Surge.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_tsl_hint: Setup varying Wild Magic Surge triggers dependent on spell level.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_tsl_die_hint: Set the dice formula you want to roll. The default is 1d20.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_tsl_lvl1_hint: Each must start with either a >, < or = followed by a space and a number.
